name: GooseNeck
description:
We met on discord and wanted to make a game in 4 days. 

The game is a 100% accurate re-enactment of the scene where Goose ejects from his plane and breaks his neck from the film "Top Gun" starring Tom Cruise. We used advanced techniques to get the graphics as cinematic as possible.*

*Graphics may not be very cinematic at all. If you're an artist please join us.
